name: node-librespot
description: Node.js bindings for librespot (Spotify Connect) via N-API with prebuild support.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:native && npm run build:types
scripts.build:debug: npm run clean && napi build && mkdir -p dist && mv -f librespot_addon.node dist/ && npm run build:types
scripts.build:native: napi build --release --strip && mkdir -p dist && mv -f librespot_addon.node dist/
scripts.clean: rm -rf build dist prebuilds *.log *.node target index.d.ts

author: Rudy Berends
